entry.title: RESIDENT EVIL: OPERATION RACCOON CITY USS Story Full Gameplay Walkthrough„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS

media:group.media:title: RESIDENT EVIL: OPERATION RACCOON CITY USS Story Full Gameplay Walkthrough„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS
media:group.media:description:
RESIDENT EVIL: OPERATION RACCOON CITY USS Story Full Gameplay Walkthrough„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS includes the full story, ending and final boss of the game. The game was played, recorded and edited by Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground team. We recorded the game in 4K 60FPS on Steam PC. The video also includes all cutscenes, final boss, all bosses, no commentary, all missions and all cinematics.
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
Umbrella Security Service (USS) Delta team enters the Raccoon City Underground Laboratory, where they meet up with Alpha team leader HUNK. Their mission is to assist the Alpha team in stopping Dr. William Birkin from handing over his T-virus research to the U.S. military and retrieve the G-virus. On their way to Birkin's lab, they find Birkin has paid numerous Umbrella Biohazard Countermeasure Service (UBCS) private military contractors to work for him while the deal goes forward. When they reach Birkin's lab, the doctor injects himself with the virus, and HUNK stays behind to fight him while Delta team proceeds.
Not long after the battle, it becomes evident that the T-virus has leaked citywide, and people are beginning to transform into flesh-hungry zombies. In what they see as a punishment by USS command, Delta team is ordered to remove evidence of Umbrella's role in the outbreak.
Later, the team is sent out around Raccoon Park to find the Nemesis-T Type, which has gone rogue. A second parasite is injected into its body in order to bring it back under control. Shortly after this mission is completed, the team is then sent out to the Raccoon City Police Department, ordered to kill any surviving police officers and destroy evidence linking the company to the outbreak. The team exits the station, and soon after encounter Leon S. Kennedy, whom they begin to hunt down along with Sherry Birkin. After they find and corner Leon, Claire Redfield, and Sherry, the game can end in two ways: in one ending, half of the team spares Leon and betrays the other and kill them. They then resign from Umbrella over their abandonment during the mission and betray them by letting the three live; in the other, Leon and Claire are executed, and Sherry is sent to an Umbrella facility. ________________________________
üîî Remember to Subscribe and hit the bell! üîî

entry.title: RESIDENT EVIL: OPERATION RACCOON CITY All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: RESIDENT EVIL: OPERATION RACCOON CITY All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
RESIDENT EVIL: OPERATION RACCOON CITY All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS Ultra HD includes the full story, ending and final boss of the game. The game was played, recorded and edited by Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground team. We recorded the game in 4K 60FPS on Steam PC. The video also includes all cutscenes, final boss, all bosses, no commentary, all missions and all cinematics.
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
USS Campaign Umbrella Security Service (USS) Delta team enters the Raccoon City Underground Laboratory, where they meet up with Alpha team leader HUNK. Their mission is to assist the Alpha team in stopping Dr. William Birkin from handing over his T-virus research to the U.S. military and retrieve the G-virus. On their way to Birkin's lab, they find Birkin has paid numerous Umbrella Biohazard Countermeasure Service (UBCS) private military contractors to work for him while the deal goes forward. When they reach Birkin's lab, the doctor injects himself with the virus, and HUNK stays behind to fight him while Delta team proceeds.
Not long after the battle, it becomes evident that the T-virus has leaked citywide, and people are beginning to transform into flesh-hungry zombies. In what they see as a punishment by USS command, Delta team is ordered to remove evidence of Umbrella's role in the outbreak.
Later, the team is sent out around Raccoon Park to find the Nemesis-T Type, which has gone rogue. A second parasite is injected into its body in order to bring it back under control. Shortly after this mission is completed, the team is then sent out to the Raccoon City Police Department, ordered to kill any surviving police officers and destroy evidence linking the company to the outbreak. The team exits the station, and soon after encounter Leon S. Kennedy, whom they begin to hunt down along with Sherry Birkin. After they find and corner Leon, Claire Redfield, and Sherry, the game can end in two ways: in one ending, half of the team spares Leon and betrays the other and kill them. They then resign from Umbrella over their abandonment during the mission and betray them by letting the three live; in the other, Leon and Claire are executed, and Sherry is sent to an Umbrella facility.
Spec Ops Campaign Spec Ops Command deployed the Echo Six team into Raccoon City in order to discover the causes of the outbreak. Heading into Raccoon City Police Department, they meet with Jill Valentine, who is fleeing the Nemesis. She points Umbrella as responsible for the outbreak and advises the team to investigate the City Hall for evidence before parting. There Echo Six finds blueprints of an Umbrella underground laboratory and heads to the sewers to find its entrance, fighting Nemesis along the way.
Moving further into the sewers, Echo Six comes into contact with the mutated Birkin attacking USS soldiers, and Claire Redfield, who is searching for Sherry Birkin. The team escort Claire and find Sherry, before being ambushed by Birkin. Claire takes Sherry away through a doorway as Echo Six covers their escape; they then defeat Birkin and continue their mission.
Finding the underground lab, Echo Six learns that T-virus is the cause of the outbreak and that the G-virus could make the situation worse. They are given orders to collect a sample of the G-virus for further study. Further, into the lab, they learn that Sherry is carrying a G-virus sample, and a Tyrant is being programmed to hunt her down to retrieve it.
Spec Ops Command receives a distress call from Leon S. Kennedy, informing them of the whereabouts of Claire and Sherry; Echo Six is tasked with assisting in their evacuation. In the extraction zone, they are attacked by the Parasite Super Tyrant; Echo Six fights it and kills it. Leon, Claire, and Sherry are then evacuated on the chopper as Command tells Echo Six to stay behind for one last mission that only they can accomplish.
________________________________

üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü Tomb Raider (2013) reimagines the origin story of Lara Croft, following her transformation from a young, inexperienced survivor into a hardened adventurer. Stranded on the dangerous island of Yamatai, Lara must endure brutal combat, solve ancient tombs, and uncover dark secrets tied to a mysterious cult. The game blends cinematic storytelling with intense action, exploration, and survival mechanics, delivering a grounded and emotional journey that defines Lara Croft‚Äôs rise as an iconic hero. ________________________________

entry.title: DYING LIGHT Saga ‚Äì Full Story Movie | All Cutscenes from All Games | 4K 60FPS Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: DYING LIGHT Saga ‚Äì Full Story Movie | All Cutscenes from All Games | 4K 60FPS Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
DYING LIGHT Full Movie Saga All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS Ultra HD includes the full story, ending and final boss of the game. The game was played, recorded and edited by Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground team. We recorded the game in 4K 60FPS on Steam PC. The video also includes all cutscenes, final boss, all bosses, no commentary, all missions and all cinematics.
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
The Dying Light saga begins in the quarantined city of Harran, where a viral outbreak has turned the population into infected and left survivors abandoned behind military cordons. Kyle Crane, an undercover operative sent by the GRE, is tasked with recovering sensitive research while infiltrating the survivor resistance. As Crane fights alongside civilians struggling to stay alive, he becomes increasingly conflicted between his mission and the people he has come to protect. The rise of the ruthless warlord Rais exposes how human ambition and cruelty thrive alongside the infection, forcing Crane to confront the cost of loyalty, obedience, and survival as Harran collapses beyond control.
In the DLC THE FOLLOWING, Crane leaves the city in search of answers, uncovering a secluded cult in the countryside that claims to understand the true nature of the virus. Led by the enigmatic Mother, the cult reveals that the outbreak may not be an accident, nor something that can simply be cured or contained. Crane‚Äôs pursuit of the truth leads to devastating choices that determine the fate of Harran and signal the beginning of humanity‚Äôs irreversible decline.
Fifteen years later, in DYING LIGHT 2: STAY HUMAN, civilization has largely fallen. The world survives in isolated city-states, and Villedor stands as one of the last strongholds of humanity. Aiden Caldwell, a wanderer searching for his lost sister Mia, is drawn into a brutal struggle between rival factions competing for power and control. As Aiden uncovers the truth about his past and the experiments that shaped him, his own infection becomes both a curse and a weapon. Every decision reshapes the city, blurring the line between savior and destroyer in a world where survival often comes at the cost of morality.
The saga continues with DYING LIGHT: THE BEAST, returning to a darker and more personal chapter of the outbreak. The story explores the consequences of prolonged infection and experimentation, pushing the boundary between human and monster. As the virus evolves and the world grows even more hostile, survival is no longer just about staying alive ‚Äî it is about resisting the loss of identity itself. The Beast represents the final stage of the Dying Light world: a future where the greatest threat is no longer the infected outside the walls, but what humanity may become in order to endure.
Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro 00:11 - Dying Light 02:44:44 - Dying Light DLC The Following 03:53:21 - Dying Light 2 13:49:20 - Dying Light: The Beast

entry.title: PROTOTYPE All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) XBOX SERIES X 4K Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: PROTOTYPE All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) XBOX SERIES X 4K Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
PROTOTYPE All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) XBOX SERIES X 4K Ultra HD
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
Alex Mercer awakens who no memory of who he is in a morgue belonging to Gentek, a genetic engineering company in Manhattan, where he escapes and witnesses scientists being killed by military operatives. After surviving being shot, Alex leaps over a wall, soon discovering his superhuman abilities; including shapeshifting, superhuman strength, speed, and creating weapons from his body; as well "consuming" others to gain their memories, skills and appearance. Amnesiac, Alex seeks to find and consume those related to the conspiracy to uncover his past. This puts him against the US Military and Blackwatch, a black ops unit attempting to contain the Blacklight virus overrunning Manhattan.

entry.title: ARMY OF TWO: THE 40TH DAY All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS

media:group.media:title: ARMY OF TWO: THE 40TH DAY All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS
media:group.media:description:
ARMY OF TWO: THE 40TH DAY All Cutscenes (Full Game Movie) 4K 60FPS includes the full story, ending and final boss of the game. The game was played, recorded and edited by Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground team. We recorded the game in 720p 60FPS on PS3 and upscaled the footage to 4K to get better bitrate. The video also includes all cutscenes, final boss, all bosses, no commentary, all missions and all cinematics.
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
Tyson Rios and Elliot Salem begin Army of Two: The 40th Day a year after the story of the original game ends as self-employed private military contractors who run, with the aid of Alice Murray, their own private company called Trans World Operations (TWO). They are engaged in a routine mission in Shanghai when things go very bad. A competing PMC attacks the city, causing mayhem and destruction and threatening Rios and Salem‚Äôs survival. Amidst their efforts to survive, Rios and Salem will also have the opportunity to take up missions in order to earn money. ________________________________

entry.title: SONIC UNLEASHED PC PORT All Boss Fights / Bosses 4K 60FPS Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: SONIC UNLEASHED PC PORT All Boss Fights / Bosses 4K 60FPS Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
SONIC UNLEASHED PC PORT All Boss Fights / Bosses 4K 60FPS Ultra HD includes the full story, ending and final boss of the game. The game was played, recorded and edited by Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground team. We recorded the game in 4K 60FPS on PC. The video also includes all cutscenes, final boss, all bosses, no commentary, all missions and all cinematics.
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
00:00 Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground Intro 00:12 Egg Cauldron 02:08 Egg Beatle 05:05 Dark Gaia Phoenix 09:21 Egg Devil Ray 12:08 Dark Moray 17:16 Dark Guardian 22:56 Egg Lancer 26:40 Egg Cauldron 2 28:52 Egg Dragoon 36:53 Dark Gaia 49:10 Perfect Dark Gaia
Sonic is pursuing his nemesis, Doctor Eggman, bounding around a fleet of spaceships. Sonic transforms into Super Sonic and corners Eggman on a nearby space station. However, it is revealed to be a powerful new weapon known as the Chaos Energy Cannon, which not only traps and forcefully reverts Sonic to his normal state and extracts the Chaos Emeralds from him, but also drains them of their power, resulting in them becoming inert. Eggman then uses the Emeralds' energy to fire an enormous laser that unleashes an ancient evil known as Dark Gaia from the planet's core, which shatters its surface into seven pieces. In addition, the process has the unforeseen side-effect of transforming Sonic into a "Werehog"‚Äîa werewolf-like affliction that strips the hedgehog of his speed but bestows greater strength and abilities‚Äîduring nighttime. Eggman ejects Sonic into space, who then lands safely onto the planet below.
After landing along with the Emeralds, Sonic encounters a friendly creature who appears to suffer from amnesia. Assuming he has caused it with his fall, Sonic decides to assist him in his quest to find out who he is and the creature becomes a guide for Sonic; he eventually gives him the nickname "Chip". Sonic's quest begins and with the help of some old friends, such as Amy Rose and Tails, he attempts to solve the crisis by traveling the world's continents and finding Gaia Temples that will restore the Emeralds' power in order to return the world, and himself, back to normal. ________________________________

entry.title: THE EVIL WITHIN 2 Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: THE EVIL WITHIN 2 Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
THE EVIL WITHIN 2 Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS Ultra HD includes the full story, ending and final boss of the game. The game was played, recorded and edited by Gamer‚Äôs Little Playground team. We recorded the game in 4K 60FPS on Steam PC. The video also includes all cutscenes, final boss, all bosses, no commentary, all missions and all cinematics.
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
The Evil Within 2 follows former detective Sebastian Castellanos as he is pulled back into the unstable world of STEM, a fractured simulation where reality is shaped by trauma, memory, and fear. Driven by the hope of reclaiming something he once lost, Sebastian must navigate a decaying town that constantly shifts between moments of calm exploration and sudden, overwhelming horror.
Gameplay blends survival horror and stealth, forcing players to manage limited resources, carefully aim weapons, and decide when to fight or avoid enemies altogether. The semi-open environments encourage exploration, offering upgrades, crafting materials, and side encounters that reward preparation and patience. Combat emphasizes tension over action, with enemies designed to punish reckless movement and poor positioning.
As the world becomes increasingly unstable, new threats and abilities emerge, pushing players to adapt their playstyle. Psychological horror, environmental storytelling, and player choice shape the experience, making survival as much about strategy and awareness as it is about confronting fear.
At its core, The Evil Within 2 is a survival horror journey that combines narrative-driven storytelling with deliberate, methodical gameplay, challenging players to endure a world where danger, uncertainty, and the mind itself are the greatest enemies.
Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro 00:56 - Into the Flame 18:51 - Something Not Quite Right 44:26 - Resonances 02:43:39 - Behind the Curtain 03:13:12 - Lying in Wait 03:41:23 - On the Hunt 04:02:43 - Lust for Art 04:57:25 - Premiere 05:14:06 - Another Evil 05:36:23 - Hidden from the Start 05:52:16 - Reconnecting 06:26:12 - Bottomless Pit 06:47:54 - Stronghold 07:39:56 - Burning the Altar 08:04:19 - The End of This World 08:15:28 - In Limbo 08:35:18 - A Way Out

entry.title: BORDERLANDS: THE PRE-SEQUEL Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: BORDERLANDS: THE PRE-SEQUEL Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
BORDERLANDS: THE PRE-SEQUEL Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K 60FPS Ultra HD
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
The Pre-Sequel features four playable characters, each with a different class and abilities. All four of The Pre-Sequel's protagonists were non-player characters (NPCs) or bosses in previous Borderlands games.
Athena, "the Gladiator", is a rogue assassin from the Atlas Corporation introduced in the Borderlands DLC campaign The Secret Armory of General Knoxx. As her primary skill, Athena can temporarily use a shield to absorb damage; her skill trees revolve around upgrading the shield, allowing it to be thrown at enemies, and absorb and reflect elemental damage, or towards melee attacks or elemental damage. ________________________________

entry.title: PROTOTYPE Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K Ultra HD

media:group.media:title: PROTOTYPE Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K Ultra HD
media:group.media:description:
PROTOTYPE Full Gameplay Walkthrough / No Commentary„ÄêFULL GAME„Äë4K Ultra HD
üåü DESCRIPTIONüåü
The game's protagonist is Alexander J. "Alex" Mercer, a shapeshifter suffering from amnesia, causing him to forget his previous life, including how he obtained his powers. As he attempts to uncover his past and stop an outbreak of a virus called Blacklight, which has overrun Manhattan, Alex comes into conflict with two factions: the United States Marine Corps and Blackwatch, a Fort Detrick special forces unit dedicated to combating biological warfare; and the Infected, people infected by the Blacklight virus, which turns them into violent monsters. The main antagonist is Robert Cross, also known by his codename, "The Specialist", a Blackwatch officer tasked with containing Alex. ________________________________
